item.description:
Bienvenue a notre premiere meet-up! Our first meetup will be at my house (amongst other things this will require me to actually finish emptying boxes --- or to hide them in the basement!). My house is down the street from Babson College in Needham. Address will be provided closer to the meeting date. I will plan on having wine and cheese, feel free to bring some as well if you'd like. (Please - nothing with pork).

I have two small very people friendly hypo-allergenic dogs. Non-smoking house.

A bientot!
item.how_to_find_us: Contact information/directions/address will be provided closer to the event date.
item.why: C'est notre premier meetup!!! I'm still in the "gauging interest" stage, donc, you should show up to show that you are interested in the success of the group.

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: Notre premier Meet-Up!
